item.title: [ZIRAK]Safezones
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

public boolean IsInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (coordY >= 3520 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if (coordY >= 3512 && coordY <= 3967 && coordX <= 3392 && coordX >= 2942) { return true;

Can someone please explain this to me? how can I redefine my SafeZones?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 04:26:26 PM[/size][hr]I know its not that complicated… ;D
